content.description: The question refer to the following code segment.
content.question: int k = a random number such that 1 ≤ k ≤ n ; for (int p = 2; p <= k; p++) for (int r = 1; r < k; r++) System.out.println("Hello"); What is the minimum number of times that Hello will be printed?

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
